Insights.TitleRowNewDetails: '%s' increased by %s and is new compared to %s.
Insights.TitleRowDisappearedDetails: '%s' decreased by %s and disappeared in %s compared to %s.
Insights.TitleRowMoverAndShaker: This row had an higher impact than the average.
Insights.IgnoredChanges: Changes affecting less than %s visits were ignored.
Insights.TitleConsideredInsightsGrowth: The following rows have a growth of at least %s%% compared to %s.
Insights.TitleConsideredInsightsChanges: The rows increased or decreased by at least %s visits (%s%% of %s total visits).
Insights.TitleConsideredMoversAndShakersGrowth: %s changed from %s to %s compared to %s. Based on this an evolution of each row of %s%% is expected.
Insights.TitleConsideredMoversAndShakersChanges: Considered movers only if they grew by more than %s%% visits or shrank by less than %s%% visits, new entries only if they increased by more than %s%% visits (%s), and disappeared rows if they shrank by less than %s%% visits (%s).
Insights.DatePeriodCombinationNotSupported: It is not possible to generate insights for this date / period combination.
Insights.DayComparedToPreviousWeek: same day in the previous week
Insights.DayComparedToPreviousYear: same day in the previous year
Insights.MonthComparedToPreviousYear: same month in the previous year
